alert.note: Alert for Jones; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 4:19PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Linn and west central Jones Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 419 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm over Waubeek, or 11 miles northwest of Anamosa, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Anamosa, Central City, Springville, Martelle, Prairieburg, Waubeek, Stone City, Whittier, Viola, Matsell Bridge Natural Area, and Howard H Cherry Scout Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
